src:
Joshua King, Mantan yang 'Menyakitkan' untuk Manchester United
03 Nov 2019, 00:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United kembali menelan kekalahan di pertandingan pekan ke 11 EPL musim ini. Bertandang ke markas Bournemouth, mereka tumbang dari tuan rumah dengan skor tipis 1-0.
Pada laga ini, Manchester United sebenarnya tampil cukup agresif. Mereka menguasai penguasaan bola dan kerap membuat peluang yang mengancam gawang The Cherries.
Namun menjelang akhir babak pertama, gawang United malah kebobolan. Adalah Joshua King, sosok yang menjadi penyebab kekalahan Setan Merah setelah ia sukses memanfaatkan kesalahan bertahan Aaron Wan-Bissaka.
Gol ini resmi menobatkan King sebagai Mantan yang 'Menyakitkan' untuk Manchester United. Pasalnya ia selalu menjadi penyebab kekalahan Manchester United saat berjumpa dengan Bournemouth.

Simak statistik istimewa King saat menghadapi Manchester United di bawah ini.
text:
Joshua King, Former 'Painful' for Manchester United
Nov 3, 2019, 00:20 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United lost another EPL Week 11 match this season. Come to the headquarters of Bournemouth, they fell from the host with a thin score of 1-0.
In this fight, Manchester United actually appear quite aggressive. They master the ball and often create opportunities that threaten the goal of The Cherries.
But towards the end of the first half, United's goal even conceded. Is Joshua King, the figure who caused the defeat of the Red Devils after he successfully exploited Aaron Wan-Bissaka's defensive mistakes.
This goal officially crowned King as a Former 'Painful' for Manchester United. Because he has always been the cause of Manchester United's defeat when he met with Bournemouth.

Check out King's special statistics when facing Manchester United below.
